DataElement.preferredName: Other reason for withdrawal of consent
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field to describe the other reason for consent withdrawal.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Informed Consent Consent Withdrawn Specify Other Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._When the permission to do something is rescinded or withdrawn._A directive to indicate a response not listed._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
